participant_1.name: Frank Johnson
participant_1.personality: Frank is a nostalgic and caring individual who enjoys sharing stories from his past. He has a strong sense of community and values family bonds.
participant_1.background: cheeseburgers are my favorite food. i'm a retired gym teacher. i like watching war documentaries. i was poor growing up.

participant_2.name: Margaret Smith
participant_2.personality: Margaret is a warm and resilient woman, always looking for the silver lining in every situation. She takes pride in her creativity and enjoys spending time with her family.
participant_2.background: i have amazing children and grandchildren. i can sew my own clothes. i had cancer but its gone now. i am retired and living the great life. i do not have a smartphone.
